QuestData.Title: Assault on Darkreach
QuestData.Description:
The Drust have inflicted enormous loss on this forest and its denizens, $n. It is time we put an end to their atrocities.
We will drive the Drust from their enclave and close their gateway into Ardenweald. With you as our vanguard, victory is assured.
I will make my way into the heart of their camp. Find me once you have routed their forces.
QuestData.LogDescription: Assault the Drust forces within Darkreach.
QuestData.RewardText:
Well fought. The Wild Hunt will deal with the rest as necessary. There is one more foe for us to vanquish.
Are you prepared?
